short.ar: في لعبة محاكاة الطائرة الواقعية هذه ، عليك الهبوط على المناطق المحددة دون وقوع حوادث.
short.am: በዚህ እውን ሊሆን የሚችል የአውሮፕላን ሲምዩሌተር ጨዋታ ላይ ያለ ምንም አደጋ ወደተወሰነ ቦታ ማረፍ አለብህ።
short.bg: В тази реалистична самолет симулатор игра, трябва да се приземи на определените зони без злополука.
short.bn: এই বাস্তবসম্মত বিমান সিমুলেটর খেলা, আপনি দুর্ঘটনা ছাড়া নির্দিষ্ট এলাকায় অবতরণ করতে হবে।
short.ca: En aquest joc realista de simulador d'avions, heu d'aterrar a les zones especificades sense accidents.
short.cs: V této realistické letecké simulátorové hře musíte bez nehody přistát na určených oblastech.
short.da: I dette realistiske flysimulatorspil skal du lande på de angivne områder uden uheld.
short.de: In diesem realistischen Flugzeugsimulator-Spiel müssen Sie unfallfrei auf den angegebenen Gebieten landen.
short.el: Σε αυτό το ρεαλιστικό παιχνίδι προσομοιωτή αεροπλάνου, πρέπει να προσγειωθείτε στις καθορισμένες περιοχές χωρίς ατύχημα.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: In this realistic airplane simulator game, you have to land on the specified areas without accident.
short.es: En este juego realista de simulador de avión, tienes que aterrizar en las áreas especificadas sin accidente.
short.et: Selles realistlikus lennukisimulaatori mängus peate maanduma määratud aladele ilma õnnetuseta.
short.fa: در این بازی شبیه ساز هواپیما واقع بینانه، شما باید در مناطق مشخص شده بدون تصادف فرود.
short.fi: Tässä realistisessa lentokoneen simulaattoripelissä sinun täytyy laskeutua määritetyille alueille ilman onnettomuuksia.
short.fil: Sa makatotohanang simulator game na ito ng eroplano, mayroon kang lupa sa tinukoy na mga lugar nang walang aksidente.
short.fr: Dans ce jeu de simulation d’avion réaliste, vous devez atterrir sur les zones spécifiées sans accident.
short.gu: આ વાસ્તવિક વિમાન સિમ્યુલેટર રમતમાં, તમારે અકસ્માત વિના ચોક્કસ વિસ્તારો પર ઉતરવું પડશે.
short.he: במשחק סימולטור מטוס מציאותי זה, אתה צריך לנחות על האזורים שצוינו ללא תאונה.
short.hi: इस यथार्थवादी हवाई जहाज सिम्युलेटर खेल में, आप दुर्घटना के बिना निर्दिष्ट क्षेत्रों पर भूमि है।
short.hr: U ovoj realističnoj igri simulatora aviona, morate sletjeti na navedena područja bez nesreće.
short.hu: Ebben a valósághű repülőgép-szimulátor játékban baleset nélkül le kell szállnod a megadott területekre.
short.id: Dalam game simulator pesawat realistis ini, Anda harus mendarat di area yang ditentukan tanpa kecelakaan.
short.it: In questo realistico gioco di simulazione di aeroplani, devi atterrare sulle aree specificate senza incidenti.
short.ja: この現実的な飛行機シミュレータゲームでは、事故なく指定されたエリアに着陸する必要があります。
short.kn: ಈ ವಾಸ್ತವಿಕ ವಿಮಾನ ಸಿಮ್ಯುಲೇಟರ್ ಆಟದಲ್ಲಿ, ನೀವು ಅಪಘಾತವಿಲ್ಲದೆ ನಿರ್ದಿಷ್ಟಪಡಿಸಿದ ಪ್ರದೇಶಗಳ ಮೇಲೆ ಇಳಿಯಬೇಕು.
short.ko: 이 현실적인 비행기 시뮬레이터 게임에서는 사고없이 지정된 지역에 착륙해야합니다.
short.lv: Šajā reālistiskajā lidmašīnas simulatora spēlē jums bez nejaušības jānolaižas norādītajās vietās.
short.ml: ഈ റിയലിസ്റ്റിക് എയർപ്ലെയിൻ സിമുലേറ്റർ ഗെയിമിൽ, നിങ്ങൾ അപകടമില്ലാതെ നിർദ്ദിഷ്ട പ്രദേശങ്ങളിൽ ഇറങ്ങേണ്ടതുണ്ട്.
short.mr: या वास्तववादी विमान सिम्युलेटर गेममध्ये तुम्हाला अपघात न होता विशिष्ट भागात उतरावे लागते.
short.ms: Dalam permainan simulator kapal terbang yang realistik ini, anda perlu mendarat di kawasan yang ditentukan tanpa kemalangan.
short.nl: In dit realistische vliegtuigsimulatorspel moet je zonder ongelukken op de opgegeven gebieden landen.
short.no: I dette realistiske flysimulatorspillet må du lande på de angitte områdene uten uhell.
short.pl: W tej realistycznej grze symulatora samolotu musisz wylądować na określonych obszarach bez wypadku.
short.ro: În acest joc simulator de avion realist, trebuie să aterizeze pe zonele specificate fără accident.
short.ru: В этом реалистичном симуляторе самолета вам предстоит приземляться на заданных участках без происшествий.
short.sk: V tejto realistickej hre so simulátorom lietadla musíte bez nehody pristáť na určených miestach.
short.sl: V tej realistični igri simulator letala, morate pristati na določenih območjih brez nesreče.
short.sv: I detta realistiska flygplanssimulatorspel måste du landa på de angivna områdena utan olycka.
short.sw: Katika mchezo huu halisi wa simulator ya ndege, lazima utue kwenye maeneo maalum bila ajali.
short.ta: இந்த யதார்த்தமான விமானம் சிமுலேட்டர் விளையாட்டில், நீங்கள் விபத்து இல்லாமல் குறிப்பிட்ட பகுதிகளில் தரையிறங்க வேண்டும்.
short.te: ఈ రియలిస్టిక్ ఎయిర్ ప్లేన్ సిమ్యులేటర్ గేమ్ లో, మీరు ఎలాంటి ప్రమాదం లేకుండా నిర్ధిష్ట ప్రాంతాల్లో ల్యాండ్ అవ్వాలి.
short.th: ในเกมจําลองเครื่องบินที่สมจริงนี้คุณต้องลงจอดในพื้นที่ที่ระบุโดยไม่เกิดอุบัติเหตุ
short.tr: Bu gerçekçi uçak simülatörü oyununda, belirtilen alanlara kazasız belasız inmeniz gerekiyor.
short.uk: У цій реалістичній грі-симуляторі літака вам доведеться без пригод приземлятися на зазначених ділянках.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you like airplane games! Discover that you are the best pilot in this crazy flight simulation game and start the fun. In aircraft games and plane jet simulators, players must complete more than nine missions as a pilot. Because the plane is challenging to control, you must carefully lift and help it glide through the air. Airplane crash and plane pilot simulator players will have mission unsuccess if their plane crashes into buildings or crashes into the sea. Most pilots never want to fail, so you must complete these plane game missions carefully.

Airplane jet and plane simulator players should lift the front part of the plane into the air and take the plane higher when they come to rough mountains or obstacles after taking off. To the task area
Explosion effects have been added to make the aircraft game more realistic. At the same time, plane flying and aero plane players will explode their planes if they make tough landings while landing their planes in their mission areas. It would help if you focused on slowly lowering the plane to the ground.

If Airplane simulator players lose control of their plane and crash it into the sea, the mission will fail, and the plane will explode. That's why it's usually necessary not to fly above the ground in airplane games. Plane simulator and airplane flight players are designed with all the details so that they can feel like real pilot. Thanks to these details, it has become possible for you to enjoy the airplane game more.

While performing aircraft missions, switching to other missions is impossible before the first missions are completed. For this reason, aero plane games and airplane flight players should proceed by unlocking all the locks starting from the first mission. You must adjust the engine power well in this airplane game and make the ascent properly. As a result of cutting the engine power suddenly, the plane will crash to the ground quickly. In airplane crash games, aeroplane players need to make a slow landing by adequately adjusting the engine level while landing their planes at the airport. After landing the plane, the next level will be unlocked.

How To Play
Played with Mouse.

Real Flight Simulator Game Features
✓ 10+ Level
✓ 3D Airplane
✓ Realistic physics
✓ Basic control
✓ 3D Environment

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Real Flight Simulator Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@gamebol.com and share your thoughts and problems.
